head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths EPSTEIN, DANIEL ROBERT

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths EPSTEIN, DANIEL ROBERT

block.p: EPSTEIN--Daniel Robert. Beloved husband of Andrea, devoted son of David and Judy, dear brother of Tom (Andrea), and Stefanie Marvin (Jeff), cherished grandson of Gertrude Finkelstein, uncle to Alyx, Zack and Noa. Suicide Girls columnist and interviewer extraordinaire. ''The light that burns twice as bright, burns half as long.'' Service is today, 12:30pm at Mount Ararat Cemetery, Farmingdale, NY.
